channel.title: Need help with a teleport tab
channel.description:
Now, it's a teleport tab. There's nothing wrong with the case in general, but the gfx.
My code: [code]case 50235: //Ancient home tele tele(3087,3494); break;[/code]
Now how would I add the ancients teleport gfx? I know this much: [code]stillgfx(392, absY, absX);[/code] 392 is the teleport gfx.
But when i teleport it does the gfx, but after I tele, the gfx will finish playing in the spot I teled from.
I would like to add it where it goes like this:
[ul][li]Starts gfx.[/li] [li]Waits for gfx to stop[/li] [li]Gfx stoped, teleport.[/li][/ul]
I want to add a timer to wait for the gfx to stop playing.
Please help maybe some ++?

item.title: Need help with a teleport tab
item.dc:creator: @Hellz_Scape Hellz Scape
item.description:
@Hellz_Scape wrote:

He means:

Case: GFX Timer on the GFX so that it stops after X amount of time Now teleport break;

Figure out what goes where.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a teleport tab

item.title: Need help with a teleport tab
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Val Mod Val
item.description:
@Mod_Val wrote:

[quote=“fatwallet, post:2, topic:306741”]From my knowledge, it doesn’t matter. The gfx will play, finish, and as it finishes it will teleport your character. If this doesn’t work, look up on how to add a timer, and work around that. Add a timer so its:

GFX START
WAIT TIMER FOR GFX END
GFX END
TELEPORT

Now thats just an outline, but it’s what you’re gonna want to do once you’ve created a timer.[/quote]

Can anyone explain this?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a teleport tab

item.title: Need help with a teleport tab
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

From my knowledge, it doesn’t matter. The gfx will play, finish, and as it finishes it will teleport your character. If this doesn’t work, look up on how to add a timer, and work around that. Add a timer so its:

GFX START
WAIT TIMER FOR GFX END
GFX END
TELEPORT

Now thats just an outline, but it’s what you’re gonna want to do once you’ve created a timer.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a teleport tab

item.title: Need help with a teleport tab
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Val Mod Val
item.description:
@Mod_Val wrote:

Now, it’s a teleport tab. There’s nothing wrong with the case in general, but the gfx.

My code:

case 50235: //Ancient home tele tele(3087,3494); break;

Now how would I add the ancients teleport gfx?
I know this much:

stillgfx(392, absY, absX);

392 is the teleport gfx.

But when i teleport it does the gfx, but after I tele, the gfx will finish playing in the spot I teled from.

I would like to add it where it goes like this:

[ul][li]Starts gfx.[/li]
[li]Waits for gfx to stop[/li]
[li]Gfx stoped, teleport.[/li][/ul]

I want to add a timer to wait for the gfx to stop playing.

Please help maybe some ++?
